title: Vote for me! I will build a wall!

embed.description: CHAPTER 1: Making sure Caitlyn looks up at the sky, bemused, the vacuum between her ears filling with a dull thought, "Do you find it strange that it never rains here? Or that it's always day time?"

body:
That's my fan fiction people. I am in desperate need of RP because I love opening chests and key fragments happen along once every 18 years.

Vote for me and I will build a wall. But I need the RP to buy Taliyah first! Anivia's wall won't keep out all those miscreants.

By the way, joking about the wall. Not racist/xenophobic.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=kaboomblah,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=htA9WfNf,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-30T11:14:59.575+0000)
>
> 
> By the way, joking about the wall. Not racist/xenophobic.

Brexit scum
Mate. I got shares. I cried. Luckily, not as bad as I thought it would be.
S-Shares? Could it possibly be... ~~gasps~~ ..._stock shares?!_
